description:
Following an accident on the job, Satsuki`s father is injured, but Leo thinks ghosts are behind it. When the gang investigates the building Satsuki`s father worked at, they find that the building itself is alive, and eager to have guests stay... for all eternity!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito o Kurau Danchi!! Akuryou no Su
Sălaşul mâncătorilor de oameni - cuibul spiritelor malefice
The Apartment that Eats People!! Nest of Evil Spirits
人を喰らう団地!! 悪霊の巣
